answers.author: Patricia Greene
answers.text:
I feel that I would get ahead of this issue by contacting the bonding agency from your previous employer and explaining your circumstances to them.  If it requires payment of a higher premium or whatever their requirements are, you can work on this well in advance of your next interview so that you can confidently explain that there were extenuating circumstances and this is how you addressed it proactively.  Hope this helps.
